metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22570 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Nullptr dereference when a null char is present in a proto symbol. The symbol is parsed incorrectly, leading to an unchecked call into the proto file's name during generation of the resulting error message. Since the symbol is incorrectly parsed, the file is nullptr. We recommend upgrading to version 3.15.0 or greater.

criterions.comment: protobuf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
